confirmConfigUpate.message: {{- configType}} configuration is managed centrally as part of the CI pipeline, local updates to the configuration will not be for productive use. Are you sure you want to continue?

errors.capDeploymentNoMta: The SAP Fiori application is within a CAP project and deployment should be configured as part of the CAP project. Please ensure you have a mta.yaml file defined for this project.
errors.folderDoesNotExist: Folder path does not exist: {{- filePath}}
errors.noAppName: Could not determine app name from manifest
errors.noBinary: Cannot find the "{{bin}}" executable. Please add it to the path or use "npm i -g {{pkg}}" to install it.
